boardgame.name: The Grimm Forest
Grimms Wälder
boardgame.description: Welcome to The Grimm Forest, where family members of the legendary Three Little Pigs are having an epic house building competition. But this is no ordinary competition as all the most famous Fairy Tale characters will be looking on and occasionally lending a hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Who will benefit most from the cunning of Robin Hood, the beauty of Snow White, the bountiful gifts of the Golden Goose or the dark witchcraft of the Evil Queen?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using only their wits, a handful of sharp steel tools, and a few stacks of resources gathered at great risk from fields, brickyards, and even the dark and deadly Grimm Forest itself, each player must compete to be the first to build 3 Houses and gain the title of Royal Builder._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players are encouraged to use any of the devious tricks they have read about in the many books of Fables found throughout the land. Some will have their plans wrecked by that villain of old, the Big Bad Wolf, while others will gain bricks, straw, and wood by the cart load._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Who will brave the dangers, avoid foul monsters, and bring home the victory? There is only one way to find out... get ready to venture into ...The Grimm Forest!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Grimm Forest is a 2-4 player strategic game of Hidden Movement, Resource Gathering, and House Building. It is a medium weight game that plays in approximately 45-60 minutes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game, players will play cards secretly to move to various Location boards where they attempt to gather resources. Using their deduction skills and a hand full of Fable cards, players attempt to guess each other's plans and make the most of their actions while disrupting the other player's plans._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After resources are collected during the Gather Phase, players will enter a Building Phase where they can use those resources to build Wood, Straw, or Brick Houses. Whenever a player builds a Wall Section on one of their houses, a helpful Friend from the nearby forest comes to lend a hand. Players may choose to accept the help of that Friend, but occasionally it makes more sense to send that Friend to a different player, sometimes discarding their current Friend in the process._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With 16 unique Fable cards and 12 powerful Friend cards, gathering resources in the Grimm Forest can be a difficult and challenging endeavor._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Work hard, deduce correctly, avoid the treachery of the other builders and the sharp teeth of the lurking monsters, and you just might have a chance!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Bienvenue dans la For_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t de Grimm, o_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ugrave; les membres de la famille des l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;gendaires Trois Petits Cochons organisent une _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;pique comp_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;tition de construction de maisons. Mais ce n'est pas une comp_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;tition ordinaire, car tous les personnages des plus c_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;bres Contes de F_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;es sont dans les parages _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; donneront m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;me parfois un coup de main._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Qui profitera le plus de la ruse de Robin des Bois, de la beaut_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute; de Blanche-Neige, des dons abondants de l'Oie aux _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;OElig;ufs d'Or ou de la sombre sorcellerie de la Reine-Sorci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;re ?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Utilisant seulement son intelligence, une poign_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;e d'outils en acier ac_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;r_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; quelques piles de ressources r_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;colt_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;es _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; grand risque dans les champs, les carri_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;res, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;me la sombre _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; meurtri_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;re For_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t de Grimm, chaque joueur doit rivaliser pour _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;tre le premier _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; construire 3 Maisons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; gagnez le titre de B_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;acirc;tisseur Royal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Les joueurs sont encourag_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;s _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; utiliser tous les trucs sournois qu'ils ont lus dans les nombreux recueils de Fables trouv_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;s dans tout le pays. Certains verront leurs plans saccag_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;s par ce vieux vilain, le Grand M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;chant Loup, tandis que d'autres rempliront leur charrette de briques, de paille _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; de bois._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Qui bravera les dangers, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;vitera les monstres immoraux _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; rapportera la victoire au foyer ? Il n'y a qu'une fa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ccedil;on de le savoir... pr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;parez-vous _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; vous aventurer dans... La For_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t de Grimm !_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;La For_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t de Grimm est un jeu strat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;gique pour 2 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; 4 joueurs de Mouvements Secrets, Collecte de Ressources _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Construction de Maisons. C'est un jeu de difficult_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute; medium qui dure environ 45-60 minutes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Durant la partie, les joueurs joueront secr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;tement des cartes pour se d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;placer dans divers Lieux, o_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ugrave; ils tenteront de r_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;colter des Ressources. En utilisant leurs comp_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;tences de d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;duction _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; une main pleine de cartes Fable, les joueurs tentent de deviner les plans des autres _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; de tirer le meilleur parti de leurs actions tout en perturbant celles des adversaires._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Apr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;s avoir collect_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute; les ressources durant la Phase de R_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;colte, les joueurs entreront dans une Phase de Construction, o_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ugrave; ils pourront utiliser ces ressources pour b_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;acirc;tir des Maisons en Bois, en Paille ou en Briques. Chaque fois qu'un joueur construit une Section de Murs pour une de ses maisons, un Ami utile de la for_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t voisine vient lui tendre la main. Les joueurs peuvent choisir d'accepter l'aide de cet Ami, mais il est parfois plus logique d'envoyer cet Ami _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; un autre joueur, d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;faussant parfois leur Ami actuel dans le processus._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Avec 16 cartes Fable uniques _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; 12 puissantes cartes Ami, r_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;colter des ressources dans la For_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t de Grimm peut s'av_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;rer une entreprise particuli_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;egrave;rement difficile._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Travaillez dur, d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;duisez correctement, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;vitez la tra_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;icirc;trise des autres b_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;acirc;tisseurs _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; les dents pointues des monstres aux aboies, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; vous pourriez avoir une chance de r_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ussir !_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: *** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q1 2018*** Contents: Kickstarter Edition of Grimm Forest Board Game. Includes Grimm Forest Board Game, KS Exclusive Box Sleeve, and all met stretch goals. Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.
